#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;

ll n;
int d, k;
int s;
int pot[15];

typedef vector<int> vi;

struct h {
  size_t operator() (const vi& u) const {
    size_t ans = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < 10; ++i) {
      ans += u[i] << 3 * i;
    }
    return ans;
  }
};

typedef unordered_map<vi, ll, h> mvi;
typedef vector<mvi> vmvi;

vmvi M;
vi v;


ll f(int r, int p) {
  if (p == s) return r == k;
  mvi::iterator fd = M[r].find(v);
  if (fd != M[r].end()) return fd->second;
  ll ans = 0;
  for (int i = 0; i < 10; ++i) if (v[i] > 0) {
    v[i]--;
    ans += f((r + i * pot[p]) % d, p + 1);
    v[i]++;
  }
  return M[r][v] = ans;
}

int main() {
  cin >> n >> d >> k;
  s = 0;
  v = vi(10, 0);
  for (; n; n /= 10ll) {
    v[n % 10ll]++;
    ++s;
  }
  int pt = 1;
  for (int i = 0; i < s; ++i) {
    pot[i] = pt;
    pt = (pt * 10) % d;
  }
  M = vmvi(d);
  cout << f(0, 0) << endl;
}
